definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Check he expiry date for all foam extinguisher.
sentences.chinese: 检查所有泡沫灭火器的过期时间。

sentences.english: The performance is optimized by using a pyrotechnic igniter as described in the Igniter web page.
sentences.chinese: 性能优化，使用烟火点火器中所述的引爆器的网页。

sentences.english: They threw eggs, sticks, bottles and a fire extinguisher at the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们向警察投掷了鸡蛋，木棍，酒瓶和一些灭火器。

sentences.english: Portable extinguishers in saloon not in position.
sentences.chinese: 大台的手提式灭火器放的位置不对。

sentences.english: Buy a fire extinguisher to keep outside.
sentences.chinese: 买一个灭火器放到室外。

sentences.english: Before the installation, should make decontamination processing for the flame arresters.
sentences.chinese: 安装前应对阻火器进行除污处理。

sentences.english: Portable extinguishers in position and operational.
sentences.chinese: 手提式灭火器在其位并好用。

sentences.english: The science of firearms and the  study of the motion of bullets.
sentences.chinese: 研究火器及子弹运动的科学。

sentences.english: Write the selected music and ignition control programs into the igniter.
sentences.chinese: 将选定的曲目的音乐及点火控制程序写入点火器中。

sentences.english: Portable extinguishers in hold No. 2 not accessible.
sentences.chinese: 放在2舱的手提式灭火器够不着。

sentences.english: Firearms rendered oldsuits of armor obsolete.
sentences.chinese: 火器使得老式装甲被废弃。

sentences.english: The Tartars employed another weapon, the so-called Chinese dragon belching fire.
sentences.chinese: 鞑靼人使用了另一种武器，所谓中国龙喷火器。

sentences.english: The school building is equipped with a lot of fire extinguishers.
sentences.chinese: 教学楼配备了许多灭火器。

sentences.english: The temperature radial distributing are evenly in the outflux of ignition.
sentences.chinese: 在点火器出口处的径向温度分布是均匀的。

sentences.english: There are a number of well - intentioned people used to fight a fire extinguisher.
sentences.chinese: 又有几个好心人拿来灭火器把扑灭了。

sentences.english: With fire-extinguisher function, and not harmful for humans body.
sentences.chinese: 具有灭火器功能且对人体无害。

definition: firearms (in historical context)/flintlock (old powder and shot firearm)
Western (or Western-style) cannon of the Ming era
big gun/cannon/artillery/one who talks big/trad. form 大炮 also used/CL:門|门[men2],尊[zun1]
